definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Nettle cloth is as good as linen cloth.
sentences.chinese: 荨麻在嫩时，叶子是一种非常好吃的蔬菜。

sentences.english: Most of the reactions were mild and of the urticarial type.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的不良反应是不严重的荨麻疹类型的。

sentences.english: And what is required for the nettle?
Treatment depends on which type or types of urticaria you have.
sentences.chinese: 治疗取决于哪些类型的荨麻疹你。

sentences.english: They plucked the long grass and nettles from the tombs, thinned the poor shrubs and roots .
sentences.chinese: 他们拔除了坟墓上的茂草和荨麻，砍断矮树和根株。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of the root of Urtica mairei Levl.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究荨麻属植物滇藏荨麻的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of the root of Urtica mairei Levl.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究荨麻属植物滇藏荨麻的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the optimum extraction of polysaccharides from Urtica fissa E.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选裂叶荨麻根中多糖的提取工艺。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the effect of behavior therapy on treating chronic urticaria .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析行为疗法治疗慢性荨麻疹的临床效果。

sentences.english: Chopped up, nettles are good for poultry;
sentences.chinese: 荨麻在嫩时，叶子是一种非常好吃的蔬菜。

sentences.english: Knaves and nettles are akin; stroak, em kindly, yet they, ll sting.
sentences.chinese: 无赖和荨麻，你轻摸也要被扎。

sentences.english: Conclusion Levocetirizine is an effective and safe agent for the treatment of CIU.
sentences.chinese: 结论左西替利嗪治疗慢性荨麻疹安全有效。

sentences.english: A monograph of Pilea (Urticaceae) in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国荨麻科冷水花属的研究。

sentences.english: This paper introduces 12 cases of pityriasis rosea complicated by urticaria.
sentences.chinese: 报道了12例玫瑰糠疹合并荨麻疹病例。

sentences.english: Of crow-flowers, nettles, daisies, and long purples.
sentences.chinese: 金凤花，荨麻，雏菊和长颈兰。
